llm_text:
Why:
The model flag is driven primarily by payment_format_ach (value=1; SHAP=+2.99374; direction=increase) — an ACH payment strongly raised the score. Secondary positive contributors were amount_received (44617.3; SHAP=+0.50560), payment_currency_saudi_riyal (value=1; SHAP=+0.49734), amount_paid (44617.3; SHAP=+0.30421) and receiving_currency_saudi_riyal (value=1; SHAP=+0.29162) — together these indicate a mid‑size transfer denominated in Saudi Riyals modestly increased the score. Offsetting the increase were from_bank (223; SHAP=-0.69020) and to_bank (118; SHAP=-0.13989), which reduced the model score.

Conclusion:
The alert is chiefly attributable to an ACH transfer (payment_format_ach=1) combined with payment/receiving currency in Saudi Riyals and a ~44,617.3 amount. The negative contribution from from_bank suggests that the sending bank partially offsets risk; if required, review of from_bank (ID 223) and payment purpose may clarify whether the flag is justified.
